title: Did the people of London support Donald Trump after a terrorist attack?
subtitle: A video shows a small group of right-wing extremist activists cheering for the President of the United States, but it was filmed months before the June 2017 attack.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: A video shows that the people of London are expressing their support for the President of the United States, following a terrorist attack in June 2017 in the city.
